content:
Experimental CO<sub>2</sub> Henry’s Coefficients for DMOF Structures at 298 K<xref rid="tbl1-fn1"></xref> DMOF-X groups per 2 BDC polar group? Henry’s coefficient (mol/kg/bar) DMOF-TF 8 Yes 1.1 DMOF-Br 2 Yes 1.6 DMOF 0 No 1.7 DMOF-Cl 2 4 Yes 1.7 DMOF-NO2 2 Yes 2.2 DMOF-DM1/2 2 No 2.4 DMOF–OH 2 Yes 2.4 DMOF-DM 4 No 2.6 DMOF-TM1/2 4 No 2.9 DMOF-TM 8 No 5.8 DMOF-A No 7.1

Bold-faced DMOF variations were chosen as representative structures for analysis via molecular simulation.
clean_text:
Table 1. Experimental CO<sub>2</sub> Henry’s Coefficients for DMOF Structures at 298 K[^a]

| DMOF-X | groups per 2 BDC | polar group? | Henry’s coefficient (mol/kg/bar) |
|--------|------------------|--------------|----------------------------------|
| DMOF-TF | 8                | Yes          | 1.1                              |
| DMOF-Br | 2                | Yes          | 1.6                              |
| DMOF    | 0                | No           | 1.7                              |
| DMOF-Cl<sub>2</sub> | 4    | Yes          | 1.7                              |
| DMOF-NO<sub>2</sub> | 2    | Yes          | 2.2                              |
| DMOF-DM<sub>1/2</sub> | 2 | No           | 2.4                              |
| DMOF–OH | 2                | Yes          | 2.4                              |
| DMOF-DM | 4                | No           | 2.6                              |
| DMOF-TM<sub>1/2</sub> | 4 | No           | 2.9                              |
| DMOF-TM | 8                | No           | 5.8                              |
| DMOF-A  |                  | No           | 7.1                              |

[^a]: Bold-faced DMOF variations were chosen as representative structures for analysis via molecular simulation.

content:
<table-wrap id="tbl2" orientation="portrait" position="float">
<label>2</label>
<caption>
<title>Experimental and Simulated Infinite
Dilution Heats of Adsorption (kJ/mol) for DMOF</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup cols="3">
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center"></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">experiment<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref12"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">simulation (298 K)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>CO</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>10.0</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>12.1</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>CH<sub>4</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>13.9</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>13.7</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>N<sub>2</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>14.9</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>11.0</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>CO<sub>2</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>19.4</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>19.6</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 2. Experimental and Simulated Infinite Dilution Heats of Adsorption (kJ/mol) for DMOF

|      | experiment[^12] | simulation (298 K) |
|------|-----------------|--------------------|
| CO   | 10.0            | 12.1               |
| CH₄  | 13.9            | 13.7               |
| N₂   | 14.9            | 11.0               |
| CO₂  | 19.4            | 19.6               |
